description: A overheat trap indicates that the on board
tempature sensor has reported a overheat
condition. System will shutdown until unit has
suficiently cooled such that operation may begin
again. A cold start trap will be issued when
the unit has come back on line.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM51-SS9000SX::overheat RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime t 31536000 RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the
network management portion of the system was last
re-initialized.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime

description: A textual description of the entity. This value should
include the full name and version identification of
the system's hardware type, software operating-system
and networking software.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr

description: A fan failed trap indicates one or more of the
cooling fans inside the device has failed. A
fanOK trap will be sent once the fan has attained
normal operation.

event.Summary: One or more cooling fans failed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM51-SS9000SX::fanfailed RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime t 31536000 RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the
network management portion of the system was last
re-initialized.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime

description: A textual description of the entity. This value should
include the full name and version identification of
the system's hardware type, software operating-system
and networking software.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr

description: A fan has tansitioned out of a failure state and
is now operating correctly.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM51-SS9000SX::fanOK RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime t 31536000 RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the
network management portion of the system was last
re-initialized.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime

description: A textual description of the entity. This value should

and networking software.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr

description: A user attempted to login to console or by telnet but was refused
access due to incorrect username or password

event.Summary: Login failure due to incorrect credential

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM51-SS9000SX::invalidLoginAttempt RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime t 31536000 RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE
